Job Description: Ref002: .Net Developer     Job Requirements : - We prefer B.TechB.E graduates   - Experience: 1-3 Years   - Experienced .NET Developer with excellent communication   - Strong development experience in (Mandatory)   XAML, ASP.NET, C#, MVC, Web APIWCF, SQL Server, Windows app, JQuery   Roles & Responsibilities   -To deliver good quality code efficiently in allocated time for .Net projects involving Design, Development and Deployment of Web Applications.   -To handle the client communication independently   -To Perform effective code reviews   -To Write unit test cases.   -To circulate project status reports periodically
